Photoshop shortcuts


-   Copy - Ctrl + C or F3

-   Cut - Ctrl + X or F2

-   Paste - Ctrl + V or F4

-   Undo - Ctrl + Z

-   Redo - Shift + Ctrl + Z

-   Zoom In - Ctrl + +

-   Zoom Out - Ctrl + -

-   Fit on screen - Ctrl + O
